get.description:
List the available models for audio transcription

returns:
    dict: list of available models

post.description:
Transcribe audio file

Args:
    background_tasks (BackgroundTasks): background tasks
    model (str): model to use for audio transcription
    audio (UploadFile): audio file
    audio_url (Optional[str]): audio url
    language_behaviour (LanguageDetectionBehaviour): behaviour to select the language
    language (Languages): language to use
    noise_reduction (bool): activate noise reduction

Returns:
    Dict: transcription

parameters.description: The AI model used for trancription.

schema.title: Model
schema.description: The AI model used for trancription.

parameters.name: model

prediction.description: The result that we want when we use an endpoint. This is the data you will need in 99/100 of cases.

prediction_raw.description: The raw result from audio processing, with extra data.

prediction.transcription: in a time when less is more
prediction.speaker: not_activated

prediction.transcription: Where too much is never enough, there is always hope for the future. The future can be read from the past. The past foreshadows the present, and the present hasn't been written yet
prediction.speaker: not_activated

audio_url.title: Audio url
audio_url.description: The file url to transcript, ignored if an audio file is provided.

language_behaviour.title: Language behaviour
language_behaviour.description: Define how the speaker's language will be detected.

language.title: Language
language.description: If language_behaviour is set to manual, define the language to use for the transcription.

noise_reduction.title: Noise reduction
noise_reduction.description: Activate the noise reduction to improve transcription quality.

toggle_diarization.title: Toggle diarization
toggle_diarization.description: Activate the diarization of the audio.

output_format.title: Output format
output_format.description: Define the output format, allowing to have JSON or STR (subtitle file format for video content)
